comment: Prof. Thoma isn't the way to go if you're looking for a good prof. If you have any problem that prevents you from attending class, she will not care. You'd think during a pandemic she'd be more understanding towards students when they say they have medical issues, or need to get a COVID test, but nope. Good luck if you take her. She's a nightmare.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: I know many people who had a bad experience with her, but I didn't have a big issue. Yeah, there was quite a lot of work to be done, but it wasn't taking too much of my time. It helps to have experience in Adobe. Please participate and answer questions, she will like it. Try to do your work early. My advice: take her online class.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Thoma does not communicate well. The only assignment that was clearly explained was the bi-weekly homework done based off a textbook. Her tutorials were missing steps and she is not willing to help you when youre struggling if she does not feel like its hard. The only reason I have a high grade is due to my prior years of experience.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Its during a pandemic.. and she just told us that if we call in sick she doesnt believe us?? Very disrespectful and rude every day. Always has an attitude.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: Horrible attitude that makes me dread typeography. Gets mad at people for asking questions. She means well but comes off as rude and doesnt have respect for students. I dont think shes had a good attitude a single day this whole semester and takes it out on us. Also is very unclear with assignments. Hope she doesnt act like this with her clients.

She doesn't specify half of the requirements for projects so you pretty much drop a letter grade just from that. For example, I turned in a project on the due date and got points off because apparently she wants you to turn it in a day early. She never said this to our class though so most of us got points off for that. It is frustrating.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: She is the most disrespectful professor I've ever had. She begs for people to ask questions, but then gets mad and says we should have been paying attention. My class tried to calmly explain to her that we need things explained again, but then she proceeded to get mad at us and gossip about us to an older student in our class after class.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: I might be in the minority but I really enjoy Thoma. She is very easy to talk to and gives feedback that I usually think is very helpful. I have had her for Computer Applications as well and she's really patient with students. The only bad part is that she never wants the students to go ahead even though they might already know what they are doing.

She claims to let us have free reign over how we go about completing assignments yet takes off points for not using programs in depth as she wanted. Unclear about her expectations, assignments, & isnt respectful to all students. She constantly sighs or gives attitude when annoyed. Can be very rude. I passed, but wouldnt retake her.

She is an okay teacher. She expects way too much out of beginners. If I did not have experience already in what we learned, I surely would have failed. She always said our projects could be whatever we wanted but then she would tell us to do what she liked instead of what we liked. Very bad at instructions and teaching in general.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring
